summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 DODGE JOURNEY. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE DRIVER'S SIDE AIR BAG INDICATOR ILLUMINATED WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT WAS CONCERNED THAT THE WARNING INDICATOR COULD LEAD TO A FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO NAPLETON'S RIVER OAKS CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM (17225 TORRENCE AVE, LANSING, IL 60438, (855) 276-1941), BUT WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE AND STATED THAT THE CONTACT COULD CALL NHTSA TO FILE A COMPLAINT. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 70,611.   UPDATED  09/01/17*LJ    THE CONSUMER STATED THE SEATBELT LIGHT REMAINED ON AT ALL TIMES. *JS
